entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 3. POP 40%

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of showers. Temperature falling to plus 1 in the afternoon. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of rain showers in the morning. Rain showers and flurries beginning near noon. Fog patches developing in the morning and dissipating in the afternoon. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature falling to plus 1 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Tuesday 17 January 2023
